comments:
I get the following "Widget is disposed" error very often when the debugger hits
a breakpoint.

1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
Log: Mon Feb 04 14:25:47 CST 2002
4 org.eclipse.ui 0 Widget is disposed
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:1887)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.checkWidget(Widget.java:221)

	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.LaunchViewEventHandler.doHandleSuspendThreadEvent(LaunchViewEventHandler.java:173)

Fixed by changes in AbstractDebugEventHandler#handleDebugEvent and #isAvailable 
etc.
Please verify.
Re-assigning to Jared to verify, as it appears it was a linux problem.
